sections.heading: 1. Terms of Use
content: You agree to use the Dr Diet service only for lawful purposes.
You are responsible for keeping your account credentials secure.

sections.heading: 2. Limitation of Liability
content: We do not guarantee uninterrupted access or error-free operation, but we strive for stability and security.

sections.heading: 3. Account Suspension
content: We may temporarily or permanently restrict access to the service in case of violations or suspicious activity.

sections.heading: 4. Changes to the Terms
content: We reserve the right to update these terms. Updates will be posted on this page.

sections.heading: 5. Contact
content: For all inquiries, please contact: support@drdiet.app
